message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $200 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am looking for something within my budget of $100. Would it be possible for us to negotiate down to that price?

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $200 is my asking price.  To move things along, I'm willing to come down to $175. I believe this product will be a valuable asset for you, even at that price.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the product, I am still looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to bring the price down to $150?
